channel.title: Blake's Basic Button Tutorial
channel.description:
This is my first tutorial, I love to help people and a person I know put up a new tutorial site and i thought I'd make a tutorial. I did take a little while but I know where I stuffed up so my next one will be better :) [center] [img]http://blaker101.elementfx.com/dd-ts/Part1.png[/img] [img]http://blaker101.elementfx.com/dd-ts/Part2.png[/img] [img]http://blaker101.elementfx.com/dd-ts/Part3.png[/img][/center] [url=http://blaker101.elementfx.com/dd-ts/Gradients(BBT1).grd] GRADIENT PACK[/url]
This can also be downloaded in one whole pack: [url=http://blaker101.elementfx.com/dd-ts/BBT1.rar]HERE[/url]
CnC absolutely welcome, flaming is not. If you can't tell the difference, do not post.

item.title: Blake's Basic Button Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Son_of_Saetan Son of Saetan
item.description:
@Son_of_Saetan wrote:

ThAt0n36Uy:

You make no sense at all.

People like you make me wonder if the de-generation theory is true.

The gradients are quite easy, if you want a lot more and even better gradients, go to dezinerfolio.com and point yourself to the download section, many handy things you can learn from there.

Read full topic
